https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/okSl59uzAQ24URfn5KyRrAUcwSW.jpg After the death of her husband Fausto, Stella decides to return to the house by the lake where she was born and where twenty years earlier she knew him, remaining conquered by the melancholy. Answer Me
